title: Superdoll Rika Chan
original_name: スーパードール・リカちゃん
sinopse:
The series is an original story spin-off inspired by the long-selling and popular Takara doll series "Licca-chan" (created by Miyako Maki, wife of Leiji Matsumoto), designed to expand the regular dress-up doll series into a line of action figures.

(Source: M-U)
